Content.p: Corbis offers a very generous benefits package. The following is a sample of the benefits offered to full-time employees in the UK:

All Corbis employees are eligible to join the Group Personal Pension scheme on completion of three months service. This is a matching contributory scheme, which is determined by your basic salary. Under the terms of the scheme if you contribute 3% or more of your basic salary Corbis will contribute the equivalent of 6% of your salary. If you decide to contribute an amount up to 3% then Corbis will match your contribution.

Corbis offers Private Medical Insurance to all employees. We also have Life Assurance at four times annual salary and Permanent Health Insurance cover in the event that an employee contracts a long-term illness.
Twenty days holiday per year plus bank holidays rising to twenty-five with service.
Season Ticket Loan for the purchase of annual travel cards. Free sight test. Employee Assistance Program: Free Counselling Service for employees and dependents.
